Module: version

Version API. Allows to query various information about the current release.
Source:
  • ext/version.js, line 5

Methods

(static) date() → {String}

Return the build date or the current date for the "DEBUG" version.
Source:
  • ext/version.js, line 29
Returns:
date string in the format: "dd.mm.yyyy hh.mm.ss"
Type
String

(static) type() → {String}

Get the release type: "DEBUG" or "RELEASE".
Source:
  • ext/version.js, line 22
Returns:
release type
Type
String

(static) version() → {String}

Get the version. The version string has the format: "yy.mm" or "yy.mm.bugfix" for "RELEASE" version or just "" for "DEBUG" version.
Source:
  • ext/version.js, line 13
Returns:
version string
Type
String
